title: Malaysian beef rendang
ingredients: ['180g desiccated coconut', '175g shallots', '3 cloves garlic', '15 dried red chillies', '5 slices fresh root ginger', '5 lemon grass sticks, chopped', '2 teaspoons coriander seeds', '2 teaspoons fennel seeds', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds', '1 pinch nutmeg', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '575g diced beef stewing steak', '1 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '5 whole cloves', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '200ml water', 'salt to taste']
